text: The Canterbury cricket team, based at Christchurch in New Zealand, has been active since 1864. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Plunket Shield which they have won twenty times, most recently in 2020â€“21. Their home ground is Hagley Oval in Christchurch. The team is known as the Canterbury Kings in limited overs matches. Category:First-class cricket teams in New Zealand
title: Canterbury cricket team
